price: 10. Mas quien reciba el registro de sus acciones por detrás de la espalda
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
